New Records: Caden Dana became the youngest pitcher in Angels history to win his major league debut.
Key Match Events: Caden Dana pitched 6.0 innings with 2 hits, 2 earned runs, 4 strikeouts, and 4 walks.
Bryce Miller pitched 4.2 innings with 4 hits, 3 earned runs, 4 strikeouts, and 3 walks.
Ben Joyce secured the save with 1.0 inning pitched, 1 hit, 0 earned runs, and 1 strikeout.
Taylor Ward homered to center (397 feet) in the 1st inning.
Luke Raley homered to center (437 feet) in the 2nd inning.
Anthony Rendon singled to left in the 5th inning, allowing Taylor Ward and Zach Neto to score.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was held at Angel Stadium in Anaheim, California with an attendance of 39,370.
The game lasted 2 hours and 36 minutes.
